member.name: T:AdvancedStringBuilder.DefaultStringBuilderPool
member.summary: Provides a default implementation of the string builder pool.

member.summary: The default initial capacity of builder.

member.name: F:AdvancedStringBuilder.DefaultStringBuilderPool.DefaultMaxBuilderCapacity
member.summary: The default maximum capacity of builder.

member.summary: Number of builders per processor.

member.summary: Initial capacity of builder.

member.name: F:AdvancedStringBuilder.DefaultStringBuilderPool._maxBuilderCapacity
member.summary: Maximum capacity of builder.

member.name: F:AdvancedStringBuilder.DefaultStringBuilderPool._firstBuilder
member.summary: First builder.
member.remarks: The first builder is stored in a dedicated field, because we expect to be able to satisfy most requests from it.

member.name: F:AdvancedStringBuilder.DefaultStringBuilderPool._builders
member.summary: Array of the retained builders.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.DefaultStringBuilderPool.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs an instance of the default pool of string builders using the default configuration settings.

member.summary: Constructs an instance of the default pool of string builders using the specified pool size.
member.param: Maximum number of builders stored in the pool.

member.summary: Constructs an instance of the default pool of string builders using the specified capacity settings.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.DefaultStringBuilderPool.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs an instance of the default pool of string builders using the specified capacity settings and pool size.
member.param: Maximum number of builders stored in the pool.

member.name: T:AdvancedStringBuilder.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AdvancedStringBuilder.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns a cached ResourceManager instance used by this class

member.name: P:AdvancedStringBuilder.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides a current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class

member.name: P:AdvancedStringBuilder.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_InitialBuilderCapacityGreaterThanMaxBuilderCapacity
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to "Initial capacity of builder must be less than or equal to the maximum capacity - {0}."

member.name: P:AdvancedStringBuilder.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_InitialBuilderCapacityNonPositive
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to "Initial capacity of builder must be a positive value."

member.name: P:AdvancedStringBuilder.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_MaxBuilderCapacityNonPositive
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to "Maximum capacity of builder must be a positive value."

member.name: P:AdvancedStringBuilder.Resources.Strings.ArgumentOutOfRange_PoolSizeNonPositive
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to "Pool size must be a positive value."

member.name: T:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for StringBuilder

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of a single argument.
member.returns: A reference to this instance with and default line terminator appended. Each format item in is replaced by the string representation of .

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of either of two arguments.
member.returns: A reference to this instance with and default line terminator appended. Each format item in is replaced by the string representation of the corresponding object argument.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of either of three arguments.
member.returns: A reference to this instance with and default line terminator appended. Each format item in is replaced by the string representation of the corresponding object argument.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of a corresponding argument in a parameter array.
member.param: An array of objects to format.
member.returns: A reference to this instance with and default line terminator appended. Each format item in is replaced by the string representation of the corresponding object argument.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of a single argument using a specified format provider.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
member.returns: A reference to this instance after the append operation has completed. After the append operation, this instance contains any data that existed before the operation, suffixed by a copy of in which any format specification is replaced by the string representation of , and default line terminator.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of either of two arguments using a specified format provider.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
member.returns: A reference to this instance after the append operation has completed. After the append operation, this instance contains any data that existed before the operation, suffixed by a copy of where any format specification is replaced by the string representation of the corresponding object argument, and default line terminator.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of either of three arguments using a specified format provider.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
member.returns: A reference to this instance after the append operation has completed. After the append operation, this instance contains any data that existed before the operation, suffixed by a copy of where any format specification is replaced by the string representation of the corresponding object argument, and default line terminator.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends the string returned by processing a composite format string, which contains zero or more format items, with default line terminator to this instance. Each format item is replaced by the string representation of a corresponding argument in a parameter array using a specified format provider.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
An array of objects to format.
member.returns: A reference to this instance after the append operation has completed. After the append operation, this instance contains any data that existed before the operation, suffixed by a copy of where any format specification is replaced by the string representation of the corresponding object argument, and default line terminator.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.TrimStart(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Removes the all leading white-space characters from the current instance.
member.returns: Instance of without leading white-space characters.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderExtensions.TrimEnd(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Removes the all trailing white-space characters from the current instance.
member.returns: Instance of without trailing white-space characters.

member.summary: Provides a resource pool that enables reusing instances of type .

member.summary: The lazily-initialized shared pool instance.

member.summary: Retrieves a shared instance.

member.summary: Ensures that has been initialized to a pool and returns it.

member.summary: Creates a new instance using the default configuration settings.

member.summary: Creates a new instance using the specified pool size.

member.returns: A new instance with the specified pool size.

member.summary: Creates a new instance using the specified capacity settings.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderPool.Rent
member.summary: Retrieves a instance of from the pool.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderPool.Rent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a instance of with at least the given capacity from the pool.
member.remarks: If the capacity is less than or equal to our maximum capacity, then return builder from the pool. Otherwise create a new string builder, that will just get discarded when released.

member.name: M:AdvancedStringBuilder.StringBuilderPool.Return(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Returns a instance of to the pool.
